channel.title: My last help needed
channel.description:
hey guys,ive finnaly setted up my server and its fully working btw,i want to add a corporal beast laters,i got the model and its already 'done' for the model as this:[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2gws1w1.jpg[/img]
btw this isnt my problem,the problem is that i dont know how to make it hits you high,when i spawn him,it attack me but only like 0s and i also need help to do his annimation
thank you if you can help

item.title: My last help needed
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

To edit the damage he hits on you it would most likely be in the NPCHandler class. For the animation, you’ll need the animation models.

Read full topic
